name: Dust: The Abandoned Land
description: Dust : The Abandoned Land is a multiplayer real-time survival roguelike that takes place in a large procedurally generated world populated with wildlife, dangerous creatures and other NPC humans (e.g. other survivors, military, bandits). You, a regular citizen, and like all the other survivors, need to sleep, eat, drink, fight for survival, but also trust the right people and help each others.
